## Usage

* Cut content. Was once able to be used during [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/) to lure [Benweth](/benweth/) from the [Deadlight Donjon](/deadlightDonjon/). Before using it, you must have convinced [Sceydwin](/sceydwin/) to teach you how with [Bluff](/bluff/) 4.
